thread.title: Tom Brady is charging absurd fees for his autograph
thread.title_full: Tom Brady is charging absurd fees for his autograph

title: Tom Brady is charging absurd fees for his autograph
text:
Tom Brady is charging absurd fees for his autograph So much money. Post to Facebook Tom Brady is charging absurd fees for his autograph So much money.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/tom-brady-autograph-signing-fee-cost-tristar-patriots-jersey-2000-dollars/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   Tom Brady is charging absurd fees for his autograph Andrew Joseph 7:24 p.m. ET Feb. 13, 2017 
New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady autographs jerseys at 'A Triumphant Celebration with Living Legend, Tom Brady' on February 8, 2017 in Boston, Massachusetts. (Photo: Getty Images for TAG Heuer) 
Tom Brady is fresh off his fifth Super Bowl win, which undeniably made his autograph more valuable. 
He seems to be taking advantage of that … in a big way. 
The memorabilia and autograph service, Tristar , announced a private signing with Brady, and it is going to cost so much money for the future Hall of Famer's autograph. 
Tristar broke the costs down by item, adding fees for special notes and personalized messages. 
Licensed trading card (3.5″ x 5″) - $499 Flat Item up to and including 11×14 - $799 Flat Item larger than 11×14, mini helmet, or football - $819 Full size helmet, or NFL licensed jersey - $849 Reproduced artwork, canvas, or multi-signed item with 5 or more signatures - $1,399 Original artwork, game used, or any other item not listed - $1,999 Inscription - Choose 1 from: 4x SB MVP, SB 51 MVP, SB 49 MVP, SB 38 MVP, SB 36 MVP, 16-0 '07 - $299 Inscription - Choose 1 from: 2x NFL MVP, 5x SB Champ, SB 51 Champs, 07 NFL MVP, 10 NFL MVP - $399 Personalization up to 20 characters - $499 
$499 for 20 characters?! That's absurd. And craziest of all, this won't be a public signing. Brady will just be signing a ton of memorabilia with representatives of Tristar, and those signed products will be delivered to the customers. Johnny Manziel even met the fans at his autograph signing. 
The prices have also gone up since Brady's last signing with Tristar. Back in 2015 , a "flat item" went for $649. It is now $799. 
Another championship ring will do that. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/tom-brady-autograph-signing-fee-cost-tristar-patriots-jersey-2000-dollars/ Most Popular
